title: [Large-Scale] Arts-Based Leadership Development Program in the Post-Truth Era

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science education and general understanding of leadership
context.additional_context: A program for practicing elementary educators to enhance leadership competencies in digital environments, with continuous monitoring of learner growth through personal device utilization and formative assessments.

learning_goals: Participants can convey clear messages in ambiguous situations through creative communication using artistic media.
Experiencing an emotional healing process through artistic activities enhances leadership resilience in a post-truth environment.
Analyzing and creating diverse artworks improves sensitivity to reading social contexts.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
